article: How to Draw a Bunny Step by Step: Easy and Realistic Methods
intro: Bunnies are adorable little creatures found in a variety of places and often associated with Easter and spring in general. They are also easy to draw. This wikiHow will teach you how to draw a bunny.

steps.title: Color the drawing.
steps.subtitle: Or take a soft pencil and add shading.
sub-points: Another option is to use water-soluble pencils. Roughly shade over an area, and then go back over the pencil with a wet brush.
